<h3 id="X35840">X(35840) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES TO 1st EHRMANN</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^4-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+3*b^4+3*c^4-2*b^2*c^2-2*(a^2+c^2+b^2)*S)  :  :
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(35840) lies on these lines:
{3,6}, {51,8855}, {69,485}, {141,10576}, {159,35776}, {193,637}, {265,35877}, {343,8280}, {394,8854}, {486,14853}, {518,35641}, {524,35822}, {542,35753}, {611,35809}, {613,35769}, {615,18583}, {732,35866}, {1327,11180}, {1352,6564}, {1386,35762}, {1469,35768}, {1503,35820}, {1589,8944}, {1843,35764}, {1991,13926}, {1992,32419}, {2781,35826}, {2854,12375}, {2987,5409}, {3056,35808}, {3070,3564}, {3071,21850}, {3093,12167}, {3242,35810}, {3416,35788}, {3618,5420}, {3751,35774}, {3818,35786}, {5032,26618}, {5412,6403}, {5418,10519}, {5480,6565}, {5846,35842}, {5921,23249}, {5965,35846}, {5969,35878}, {6393,35685}, {6460,14912}, {6560,6776}, {7583,34380}, {9024,35882}, {9830,35698}, {9970,12376}, {10577,14561}, {10665,34382}, {11427,18290}, {11579,35827}, {11898,13665}, {12177,35879}, {12222,32982}, {12329,35772}, {12452,35778}, {12453,35780}, {12583,35790}, {12586,35796}, {12587,35798}, {12588,35800}, {12589,35802}, {12590,35804}, {12591,35806}, {12594,35816}, {12595,35818}, {12970,34779}, {13847,14848}, {13910,35812}, {13972,35814}, {18440,23251}, {19140,32292}, {20423,35823}, {22769,35784}, {31670,35821}, {34146,35864}, {35824,35838}, {35872,35874}</p>
<p>
X(35840) = midpoint of X(193) and X(637)<br>
X(35840) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (69, 639), (371, 6), (11824, 13355), (35841, 5028)<br>
X(35840) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 1504, 371), (3, 3311, 8414), (3, 6566, 6396), (6, 1152, 5050), (6, 1350, 19145), (6, 1351, 35841), (6, 5102, 9975), (6, 12968, 1692), (182, 5107, 35841), (372, 6200, 2459), (372, 35792, 3103), (576, 5052, 35841), (1350, 19145, 6200), (1570, 5062, 6), (3106, 12231, 2037), (3312, 5093, 6), (3385, 3386, 6423), (3594, 15884, 372), (6398, 8589, 6396), (9974, 15884, 11482), (35792, 35794, 372)<br>
</p>
